analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttika sa hetuka duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasahetuko dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na sa hetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham sa hetukam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasahetuko ca
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa hetukaḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham ahetukam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na ahetukaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
